mapper.select: select r from room where a = #{param1}
select r, a, mid, rname, rmin, rmax, rprice, rimg1, rimg2, rimg3, rtype, rbedroom, rrestroom, rdiningroom, rkitchen, rtheme, writedate from room where r=#{r}
mapper.update: update room set rname=#{rname}, rmin=#{rmin}, rmax=#{rmax}, rprice=#{rprice}, rimg1=#{rimg1}, rimg2=#{rimg2}, rimg3=#{rimg3}, rtype=#{rtype}, rbedroom=#{rbedroom}, rrestroom=#{rrestroom}, rdiningroom=#{rdiningroom}, rkitchen=#{rkitchen}, rtheme=#{rtheme}, writedate=sysdate where r=#{r}
mapper.insert: insert into room(r, a, mid, rname, rmin, rmax, rprice, rimg1, rimg2, rimg3, rtype, rbedroom, rdiningroom, rrestroom, rkitchen, rtheme, writedate) values(roomsq.nextval, (select a from accomodation where mid=#{mid}), #{mid}, #{rname}, #{rmin}, #{rmax}, #{rprice}, #{rimg1}, #{rimg2}, #{rimg3}, #{rtype}, #{rbedroom}, #{rrestroom},#{rdiningroom}, #{rkitchen}, #{rtheme}, sysdate)
